segments.text: Would you like some cookies ? I just made them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These are chocolate , and those are almond-flavored .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess I'll try a chocolate one first.Mmmm ... this is delicious.Are they hard to make ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they're really quite easy . Wait a minute , I've got the recipe right here.See ... these are the ingredients , and then you just follow the directions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That does look easy . I think I'll make some tonight .
segments.speaker: S2
